title: A Study of Cross-Validation and Bootstrap for Accuracy Estimation and Model Selection

To demonstrate the issue, we simulated a 2/3, 1/3 split of Fisher's famous iris dataset and used a majority inducer that builds a classifier predicting the prevalent class in the training set.
